title: Ticket #5634: DC_DAEMON_LIST locally-named daemons should get ARG automatically
description: When we fix locally-named daemon configuration [ref some other ticket here], we would be able to eliminate the LOCAL_NAME_ARGS/LOCAL_NAME_ENV lines entirely, except that we also need to tell the daemon what its local name is on the command line. This is something the HTCondor should do for us, if the locally-named daemon is added to the DC_DAEMON_LIST.
remarks: See #5768.
